import web
                
        urls = (
            '/(.*)', 'hello'
        )
        app = web.application(urls, globals())
        
        class hello:        
            def GET(self, name):
                if not name: 
                    name = 'World'
                return 'Hello, ' + name + '!'
        
        if __name__ == ""__main__"":
            app.run()
